name: MIS Appointments
description:
Lists Activities per Page, By Slot and Activity, By Surname, By Activity, By Cell Location and a Summary Page.

ACT0039 v00:00:01 Last Modified: 13/11/19

dataset.name: All Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (CASE WHEN 'All' IN ('All') THEN 'All' ELSE AT_CELL.UNIT_2_DESCRIPTION END IN ('All')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, IEP_BAND, DATE_OF_BIRTH, CASE WHEN ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION IS NULL THEN 'Not Allocated' ELSE ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION END AS V_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ALL_P36, RELEASE_DATE_CURRENT AS V_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE AS V_SLOT_ALL_PRISONERS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Activity Allocation
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) = TO_DATE('08-06-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND CASE WHEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE IS NULL THEN 'Y' WHEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE > TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END = 'Y' AND AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (CASE WHEN 'All' IN ('All') THEN 'All' ELSE AT_CELL.UNIT_2_DESCRIPTION END IN ('All')) AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SUSPENDED_FLAG = 'N' AND (CASE WHEN TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_END_DATE) <> '31/12/9999' THEN TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_END_DATE) END >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) OR CASE WHEN TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_END_DATE) <> '31/12/9999' THEN TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_END_DATE) END IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, START_TIME, SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, CASE WHEN ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION IS NULL THEN 'Not Allocated' ELSE ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION END AS V_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ALL_P36, RELEASE_DATE_CURRENT AS V_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Release Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.CURR_RELEASE_DATE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (   Select AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK as OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK, case when AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' Then AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE end as CURR_RELEASE_DATE From --BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE AT_FACT_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_RELEASE_DATE where --AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=AT_FACT_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.RELEASE_CALCULATED_DATE_SK=AT_RELEASE_DATE.DATE_SK(+) and AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_CURRENT_FLAG='Y' --and AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE !='31/12/9000' ) DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) ) AND ( AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID=CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username from context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')-6 ) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG='Y' ) AND ( ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK =(SELECT establishment_code from prompt_) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y' ) AND ( case when 'All' in ('All') then 'All' else AT_CELL.UNIT_2_DESCRIPTION end in ('All') ) )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Appointments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_BODISTAG_INT_LOC.DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'ACTI' THEN 'Activities' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'CANT' THEN 'Canteen' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'CHAP' THEN 'Chaplaincy' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'EDUC' THEN 'Education' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'GOVE' THEN 'Governor' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'LACO' THEN 'Labour Control' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'IMB' THEN 'IMB' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'LIBR' THEN 'Library' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'OTHE' THEN 'Other' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'CABA' THEN 'Case - Bail Apps' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'CABE' THEN 'Case - Benefits' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'CACA' THEN 'Case - CARATS' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'CAHO' THEN 'Case - Housing' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'CALA' THEN 'Case - Legal Aid' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'CAPR' THEN 'Case - Probation' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'CAOT' THEN 'Case - Other' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'MEDE' THEN 'Medical - Dentist' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'MEDO' THEN 'Medical - Doctor' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'MEOP' THEN 'Medical - Optician' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'MEPS' THEN 'Medical - Psy' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'MEXR' THEN 'Medical - X-ray' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'MEOT' THEN 'Medical - Other' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'REPH' THEN 'Rec - Photo' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'REPR' THEN 'Rec - Prop' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'REOT' THEN 'Rec - Other' WHEN AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE = 'OIC' THEN 'Adjudcation Review' ELSE AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE END AS SCHEDULE_REASON_DESCRIPTION, AT_APPNT_SCHED.SCHEDULE_TIME, AT_DIM_APPDT.DAY_DATE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODISTAGING.REF_AGY_INT_LOCATIONS AT_BODISTAG_INT_LOC, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_SCHEDULE AT_APPNT_SCHED, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_APPDT, BODISTAGING.REF_OFFENDER_INT_SCHEDULES AT_BODISTAG_INT_SCHED WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_APPNT_SCHED.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_APPNT_SCHED.DATE_SK = AT_DIM_APPDT.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_TYPE (+) = 'APP') AND (AT_APPNT_SCHED.OUTCOME (+) = 'Scheduled (Approved)') AND (AT_APPNT_SCHED.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_APPNT_SCHED.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_APPNT_SCHED.EVENT_ID_NK = AT_BODISTAG_INT_SCHED.EVENT_ID) AND (AT_BODISTAG_INT_LOC.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID = AT_BODISTAG_INT_SCHED.TO_INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND AT_DIM_APPDT.DAY_DATE = TO_DATE('08-06-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION, SCHEDULE_REASON_DESCRIPTION, SCHEDULE_TIME, DAY_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
